name: Waku Waku Derby
overview: A new sensational horse racing simulation game as a result of combining board game and racing game together! Raise your horse during the board phase and win the race with your favorite horse during the racing phase to earn the prize money. The trick for wining the race is to plan your strategy by utilizing the characteristics of the horse and make use of information such as the racing distance and courses on the turf or dirt. So work your way to keep winning with your favorite horse!
